00017       subroutine  dcopy(n,dx,incx,dy,incy) 
00018 !                                                                       
00019 !     copies a vector, x, to a vector, y.                               
00020 !     uses unrolled loops for increments equal to one.                  
00021 !     jack dongarra, linpack, 3/11/78.                                  
00022 !                                                                       
00023       real(wp) dx(*),dy(*) 
00024       integer i,incx,incy,ix,iy,m,mp1,n 
00025 !                                                                       
00026       if(n <= 0)return 
00027       if(incx == 1.and.incy == 1)go to 20 
00028 !                                                                       
00029 !        code for unequal increments or equal increments                
00030 !          not equal to 1                                               
00031 !                                                                       
00032       ix = 1 
00033       iy = 1 
00034       if(incx < 0)ix = (-n+1)*incx + 1 
00035       if(incy < 0)iy = (-n+1)*incy + 1 
00036       do 10 i = 1,n 
00037         dy(iy) = dx(ix) 
00038         ix = ix + incx 
00039         iy = iy + incy 
00040    10 continue 
00041       return 
00042 !                                                                       
00043 !        code for both increments equal to 1                            
00044 !                                                                       
00045 !                                                                       
00046 !        clean-up loop                                                  
00047 !                                                                       
00048    20 m = mod(n,7) 
00049       if( m  ==  0 ) go to 40 
00050       do 30 i = 1,m 
00051         dy(i) = dx(i) 
00052    30 continue 
00053       if( n  <  7 ) return 
00054    40 mp1 = m + 1 
00055       do 50 i = mp1,n,7 
00056         dy(i) = dx(i) 
00057         dy(i + 1) = dx(i + 1) 
00058         dy(i + 2) = dx(i + 2) 
00059         dy(i + 3) = dx(i + 3) 
00060         dy(i + 4) = dx(i + 4) 
00061         dy(i + 5) = dx(i + 5) 
00062         dy(i + 6) = dx(i + 6) 
00063    50 continue 
00064       return 
00065       end subroutine dcopy
00066                                                                         
00067 !=============================================================================80
00068 
00069       real(wp) function ddot(n,dx,incx,dy,incy) 
00070 !                                                                       
00071 !     forms the dot product of two vectors.                             
00072 !     uses unrolled loops for increments equal to one.                  
00073 !     jack dongarra, linpack, 3/11/78.                                  
00074 !                                                                       
00075       real(wp) dx(*),dy(*),dtemp 
00076       integer i,incx,incy,ix,iy,m,mp1,n 
00077 !                                                                       
00078       ddot = 0.0_wp 
00079       dtemp = 0.0_wp 
00080       if(n <= 0)return 
00081       if(incx == 1.and.incy == 1)go to 20 
00082 !                                                                       
00083 !        code for unequal increments or equal increments                
00084 !          not equal to 1                                               
00085 !                                                                       
00086       ix = 1 
00087       iy = 1 
00088       if(incx < 0)ix = (-n+1)*incx + 1 
00089       if(incy < 0)iy = (-n+1)*incy + 1 
00090       do 10 i = 1,n 
00091         dtemp = dtemp + dx(ix)*dy(iy) 
00092         ix = ix + incx 
00093         iy = iy + incy 
00094    10 continue 
00095       ddot = dtemp 
00096       return 
00097 !                                                                       
00098 !        code for both increments equal to 1                            
00099 !                                                                       
00100 !                                                                       
00101 !        clean-up loop                                                  
00102 !                                                                       
00103    20 m = mod(n,5) 
00104       if( m  ==  0 ) go to 40 
00105       do 30 i = 1,m 
00106         dtemp = dtemp + dx(i)*dy(i) 
00107    30 continue 
00108       if( n  <  5 ) go to 60 
00109    40 mp1 = m + 1 
00110       do 50 i = mp1,n,5 
00111         dtemp = dtemp + dx(i)*dy(i) + dx(i + 1)*dy(i + 1) +             &
00112      &   dx(i + 2)*dy(i + 2) + dx(i + 3)*dy(i + 3) + dx(i + 4)*dy(i + 4)
00113    50 continue 
00114    60 ddot = dtemp 
00115       return 
00116       end function ddot
00117                                                                         
00118 !=============================================================================80
00119 
00120       real(wp) function dasum(n,dx,incx) 
00121 !                                                                       
00122 !     takes the sum of the absolute values.                             
00123 !     jack dongarra, linpack, 3/11/78.                                  
00124 !                                                                       
00125       real(wp) dx(*),dtemp 
00126       integer i,incx,m,mp1,n,nincx 
00127 !                                                                       
00128       dasum = 0.0_wp 
00129       dtemp = 0.0_wp 
00130       if(n <= 0)return 
00131       if(incx == 1)go to 20 
00132 !                                                                       
00133 !        code for increment not equal to 1                              
00134 !                                                                       
00135       nincx = n*incx 
00136       do 10 i = 1,nincx,incx 
00137         dtemp = dtemp + dabs(dx(i)) 
00138    10 continue 
00139       dasum = dtemp 
00140       return 
00141 !                                                                       
00142 !        code for increment equal to 1                                  
00143 !                                                                       
00144 !                                                                       
00145 !        clean-up loop                                                  
00146 !                                                                       
00147    20 m = mod(n,6) 
00148       if( m  ==  0 ) go to 40 
00149       do 30 i = 1,m 
00150         dtemp = dtemp + dabs(dx(i)) 
00151    30 continue 
00152       if( n  <  6 ) go to 60 
00153    40 mp1 = m + 1 
00154       do 50 i = mp1,n,6 
00155         dtemp = dtemp + dabs(dx(i)) + dabs(dx(i + 1)) + dabs(dx(i + 2)) &
00156      &  + dabs(dx(i + 3)) + dabs(dx(i + 4)) + dabs(dx(i + 5))           
00157    50 continue 
00158    60 dasum = dtemp 
00159       return 
00160       end function dasum

00163 
00164       subroutine daxpy(n,da,dx,incx,dy,incy) 
00165 !                                                                       
00166 !     constant times a vector plus a vector.                            
00167 !     uses unrolled loops for increments equal to one.                  
00168 !     jack dongarra, linpack, 3/11/78.                                  
00169 !                                                                       
00170       implicit none 
00171 
00172       integer,     intent(in)  :: n, incx, incy
00173       real(wp), intent(in)  :: dx(*), da
00174       real(wp), intent(out) :: dy(*)
00175 
00176       integer :: ix, iy, i, m, mp1, ns
00177 
00178 !                                                                       
00179       if(n <= 0)return 
00180       if (da  ==  0.0_wp) return 
00181       if(incx == 1.and.incy == 1)go to 20 
00182 !                                                                       
00183 !        code for unequal increments or equal increments                
00184 !          not equal to 1                                               
00185 !                                                                       
00186       ix = 1 
00187       iy = 1 
00188       if(incx < 0)ix = (-n+1)*incx + 1 
00189       if(incy < 0)iy = (-n+1)*incy + 1 
00190       do 10 i = 1,n 
00191         dy(iy) = dy(iy) + da*dx(ix) 
00192         ix = ix + incx 
00193         iy = iy + incy 
00194    10 continue 
00195       return 
00196 !                                                                       
00197 !        code for both increments equal to 1                            
00198 !                                                                       
00199 !                                                                       
00200 !        clean-up loop                                                  
00201 !                                                                       
00202    20 m = mod(n,4) 
00203       if( m  ==  0 ) go to 40 
00204       do 30 i = 1,m 
00205         dy(i) = dy(i) + da*dx(i) 
00206    30 continue 
00207       if( n  <  4 ) return 
00208    40 mp1 = m + 1 
00209       do 50 i = mp1,n,4 
00210         dy(i) = dy(i) + da*dx(i) 
00211         dy(i + 1) = dy(i + 1) + da*dx(i + 1) 
00212         dy(i + 2) = dy(i + 2) + da*dx(i + 2) 
00213         dy(i + 3) = dy(i + 3) + da*dx(i + 3) 
00214    50 continue 
00215       return 
00216       end subroutine daxpy
00217

00219 
00220       real(wp) function dnrm2 ( n, dx, incx) 
00221       integer          next 
00222       real(wp)   dx(*), cutlo, cuthi, hitest, sum, xmax,zero,one 
00223       data   zero, one /0.0_wp, 1.0_wp/ 
00224 !                                                                       
00225 !     euclidean norm of the n-vector stored in dx() with storage        
00226 !     increment incx .                                                  
00227 !     if    n  <=  0 return with result = 0.                            
00228 !     if n  >=  1 then incx must be  >=  1                              
00229 !                                                                       
00230 !           c.l.lawson, 1978 jan 08                                     
00231 !                                                                       
00232 !     four phase method     using two built-in constants that are       
00233 !     hopefully applicable to all machines.                             
00234 !         cutlo = maximum of  dsqrt(u/eps)  over all known machines.    
00235 !         cuthi = minimum of  dsqrt(v)      over all known machines.    
00236 !     where                                                             
00237 !         eps = smallest no. such that eps + 1.  >  1.                 
00238 !         u   = smallest positive no.   (underflow limit)               
00239 !         v   = largest  no.            (overflow  limit)               
00240 !                                                                       
00241 !     brief outline of algorithm..                                      
00242 !                                                                       
00243 !     phase 1    scans zero components.                                 
00244 !     move to phase 2 when a component is nonzero and  <=  cutlo        
00245 !     move to phase 3 when a component is  >  cutlo                    
00246 !     move to phase 4 when a component is  >=  cuthi/m                  
00247 !     where m = n for x() real and m = 2*n for complex.                 
00248 !                                                                       
00249 !     values for cutlo and cuthi..                                      
00250 !     from the environmental parameters listed in the imsl converter    
00251 !     document the limiting values are as follows..                     
00252 !     cutlo, s.p.   u/eps = 2**(-102) for  honeywell.  close seconds are
00253 !                   univac and dec at 2**(-103)                         
00254 !                   thus cutlo = 2**(-51) = 4.44089e-16                 
00255 !     cuthi, s.p.   v = 2**127 for univac, honeywell, and dec.          
00256 !                   thus cuthi = 2**(63.5) = 1.30438e19                 
00257 !     cutlo, d.p.   u/eps = 2**(-67) for honeywell and dec.             
00258 !                   thus cutlo = 2**(-33.5) = 8.23181d-11               
00259 !     cuthi, d.p.   same as s.p.  cuthi = 1.30438d19                    
00260 !     data cutlo, cuthi / 8.232d-11,  1.304d19 /                        
00261 !     data cutlo, cuthi / 4.441e-16,  1.304e19 /                        
00262       data cutlo, cuthi / 8.232d-11,  1.304d19 / 
00263 !                                                                       
00264       if(n  >  0) go to 10 
00265          dnrm2  = zero 
00266          go to 300 
00267 !                                                                       
00268    10 assign 30 to next 
00269       sum = zero 
00270       nn = n * incx 
00271 !                                                 begin main loop       
00272       i = 1 
00273    20    go to next,(30, 50, 70, 110) 
00274    30 if( dabs(dx(i))  >  cutlo) go to 85 
00275       assign 50 to next 
00276       xmax = zero 
00277 !                                                                       
00278 !                        phase 1.  sum is zero                          
00279 !                                                                       
00280    50 if( dx(i)  ==  zero) go to 200 
00281       if( dabs(dx(i))  >  cutlo) go to 85 
00282 !                                                                       
00283 !                                prepare for phase 2.                   
00284       assign 70 to next 
00285       go to 105 
00286 !                                                                       
00287 !                                prepare for phase 4.                   
00288 !                                                                       
00289   100 i = j 
00290       assign 110 to next 
00291       sum = (sum / dx(i)) / dx(i) 
00292   105 xmax = dabs(dx(i)) 
00293       go to 115 
00294 !                                                                       
00295 !                   phase 2.  sum is small.                             
00296 !                             scale to avoid destructive underflow.     
00297 !                                                                       
00298    70 if( dabs(dx(i))  >  cutlo ) go to 75 
00299 !                                                                       
00300 !                     common code for phases 2 and 4.                   
00301 !                     in phase 4 sum is large.  scale to avoid overflow.
00302 !                                                                       
00303   110 if( dabs(dx(i))  <=  xmax ) go to 115 
00304          sum = one + sum * (xmax / dx(i))**2 
00305          xmax = dabs(dx(i)) 
00306          go to 200 
00307 !                                                                       
00308   115 sum = sum + (dx(i)/xmax)**2 
00309       go to 200 
00310 !                                                                       
00311 !                                                                       
00312 !                  prepare for phase 3.                                 
00313 !                                                                       
00314    75 sum = (sum * xmax) * xmax 
00315 !                                                                       
00316 !                                                                       
00317 !     for real or d.p. set hitest = cuthi/n                             
00318 !     for complex      set hitest = cuthi/(2*n)                         
00319 !                                                                       
00320    85 hitest = cuthi/float( n ) 
00321 !                                                                       
00322 !                   phase 3.  sum is mid-range.  no scaling.            
00323 !                                                                       
00324       do 95 j =i,nn,incx 
00325       if(dabs(dx(j))  >=  hitest) go to 100 
00326    95    sum = sum + dx(j)**2 
00327       dnrm2 = dsqrt( sum ) 
00328       go to 300 
00329 !                                                                       
00330   200 continue 
00331       i = i + incx 
00332       if ( i  <=  nn ) go to 20 
00333 !                                                                       
00334 !              end of main loop.                                        
00335 !                                                                       
00336 !              compute square root and adjust for scaling.              
00337 !                                                                       
00338       dnrm2 = xmax * dsqrt(sum) 
00339   300 continue 
00340       return 
00341       end function dnrm2
00342                                                                         
00343 !=============================================================================80
00344 
00345       subroutine  dscal(n,da,dx,incx) 
00346 !     scales a vector by a constant.                                    
00347 !     uses unrolled loops for increment equal to one.                   
00348 !     jack dongarra, linpack, 3/11/78.                                  
00349 !                                                                       
00350       real(wp) da,dx(*) 
00351       integer i,incx,m,mp1,n,nincx 
00352 !                                                                       
00353       if(n <= 0)return 
00354       if(incx == 1)go to 20 
00355 !                                                                       
00356 !        code for increment not equal to 1                              
00357 !                                                                       
00358       nincx = n*incx 
00359       do 10 i = 1,nincx,incx 
00360         dx(i) = da*dx(i) 
00361    10 continue 
00362       return 
00363 !                                                                       
00364 !        code for increment equal to 1                                  
00365 !                                                                       
00366 !                                                                       
00367 !        clean-up loop                                                  
00368 !                                                                       
00369    20 m = mod(n,5) 
00370       if( m  ==  0 ) go to 40 
00371       do 30 i = 1,m 
00372         dx(i) = da*dx(i) 
00373    30 continue 
00374       if( n  <  5 ) return 
00375    40 mp1 = m + 1 
00376       do 50 i = mp1,n,5 
00377         dx(i) = da*dx(i) 
00378         dx(i + 1) = da*dx(i + 1) 
00379         dx(i + 2) = da*dx(i + 2) 
00380         dx(i + 3) = da*dx(i + 3) 
00381         dx(i + 4) = da*dx(i + 4) 
00382    50 continue 
00383       return 
00384       end subroutine  dscal

00388       subroutine  dswap (n,dx,incx,dy,incy) 
00389 !                                                                       
00390 !     interchanges two vectors.                                         
00391 !     uses unrolled loops for increments equal one.                     
00392 !     jack dongarra, linpack, 3/11/78.                                  
00393 !                                                                       
00394       real(wp) dx(*),dy(*),dtemp 
00395       integer i,incx,incy,ix,iy,m,mp1,n 
00396 !                                                                       
00397       if(n <= 0)return 
00398       if(incx == 1.and.incy == 1)go to 20 
00399 !                                                                       
00400 !       code for unequal increments or equal increments not equal       
00401 !         to 1                                                          
00402 !                                                                       
00403       ix = 1 
00404       iy = 1 
00405       if(incx < 0)ix = (-n+1)*incx + 1 
00406       if(incy < 0)iy = (-n+1)*incy + 1 
00407       do 10 i = 1,n 
00408         dtemp = dx(ix) 
00409         dx(ix) = dy(iy) 
00410         dy(iy) = dtemp 
00411         ix = ix + incx 
00412         iy = iy + incy 
00413    10 continue 
00414       return 
00415 !                                                                       
00416 !       code for both increments equal to 1                             
00417 !                                                                       
00418 !                                                                       
00419 !       clean-up loop                                                   
00420 !                                                                       
00421    20 m = mod(n,3) 
00422       if( m  ==  0 ) go to 40 
00423       do 30 i = 1,m 
00424         dtemp = dx(i) 
00425         dx(i) = dy(i) 
00426         dy(i) = dtemp 
00427    30 continue 
00428       if( n  <  3 ) return 
00429    40 mp1 = m + 1 
00430       do 50 i = mp1,n,3 
00431         dtemp = dx(i) 
00432         dx(i) = dy(i) 
00433         dy(i) = dtemp 
00434         dtemp = dx(i + 1) 
00435         dx(i + 1) = dy(i + 1) 
00436         dy(i + 1) = dtemp 
00437         dtemp = dx(i + 2) 
00438         dx(i + 2) = dy(i + 2) 
00439         dy(i + 2) = dtemp 
00440    50 continue 
00441       return 
00442       end subroutine  dswap
00443

00446       integer function idamax(n,dx,incx) 
00447 !                                                                       
00448 !     finds the index of element having max. absolute value.            
00449 !     jack dongarra, linpack, 3/11/78.                                  
00450 !                                                                       
00451       real(wp) dx(*),dmax 
00452       integer i,incx,ix,n 
00453 !                                                                       
00454       idamax = 0 
00455       if( n  <  1 ) return 
00456       idamax = 1 
00457       if(n == 1)return 
00458       if(incx == 1)go to 20 
00459 !                                                                       
00460 !        code for increment not equal to 1                              
00461 !                                                                       
00462       ix = 1 
00463       dmax = dabs(dx(1)) 
00464       ix = ix + incx 
00465       do 10 i = 2,n 
00466          if(dabs(dx(ix)) <= dmax) go to 5 
00467          idamax = i 
00468          dmax = dabs(dx(ix)) 
00469     5    ix = ix + incx 
00470    10 continue 
00471       return 
00472 !                                                                       
00473 !        code for increment equal to 1                                  
00474 !                                                                       
00475    20 dmax = dabs(dx(1)) 
00476       do 30 i = 2,n 
00477          if(dabs(dx(i)) <= dmax) go to 30 
00478          idamax = i 
00479          dmax = dabs(dx(i)) 
00480    30 continue 
00481       return 
00482       end function idamax
00483                                                                         
00484 !=============================================================================80
00485 
00486       subroutine  drot (n,dx,incx,dy,incy,c,s) 
00487 !                                                                       
00488 !     applies a plane rotation.                                         
00489 !     jack dongarra, linpack, 3/11/78.                                  
00490 !                                                                       
00491       real(wp) dx(*),dy(*),dtemp,c,s 
00492       integer i,incx,incy,ix,iy,n 
00493 !                                                                       
00494       if(n <= 0)return 
00495       if(incx == 1.and.incy == 1)go to 20 
00496 !                                                                       
00497 !       code for unequal increments or equal increments not equal       
00498 !         to 1                                                          
00499 !                                                                       
00500       ix = 1 
00501       iy = 1 
00502       if(incx < 0)ix = (-n+1)*incx + 1 
00503       if(incy < 0)iy = (-n+1)*incy + 1 
00504       do 10 i = 1,n 
00505         dtemp = c*dx(ix) + s*dy(iy) 
00506         dy(iy) = c*dy(iy) - s*dx(ix) 
00507         dx(ix) = dtemp 
00508         ix = ix + incx 
00509         iy = iy + incy 
00510    10 continue 
00511       return 
00512 !                                                                       
00513 !       code for both increments equal to 1                             
00514 !                                                                       
00515    20 do 30 i = 1,n 
00516         dtemp = c*dx(i) + s*dy(i) 
00517         dy(i) = c*dy(i) - s*dx(i) 
00518         dx(i) = dtemp 
00519    30 continue 
00520       return 
00521       end subroutine  drot
00522 
00523 !=============================================================================80
00524 
00525       subroutine drotg(da,db,c,s) 
00526 !                                                                       
00527 !     construct givens plane rotation.                                  
00528 !     jack dongarra, linpack, 3/11/78.                                  
00529 !                                                                       
00530       real(wp) da,db,c,s,roe,scale,r,z 
00531 !                                                                       
00532       roe = db 
00533       if( dabs(da)  >  dabs(db) ) roe = da 
00534       scale = dabs(da) + dabs(db) 
00535       if( scale  /=  0.0_wp ) go to 10 
00536          c = 1.0_wp 
00537          s = 0.0_wp 
00538          r = 0.0_wp 
00539          go to 20 
00540    10 r = scale*dsqrt((da/scale)**2 + (db/scale)**2) 
00541       r = dsign(1.0_wp,roe)*r 
00542       c = da/r 
00543       s = db/r 
00544    20 z = 1.0_wp 
00545       if( dabs(da)  >  dabs(db) ) z = s 
00546       if( dabs(db)  >=  dabs(da) .and. c  /=  0.0_wp ) z = 1.0_wp/c 
00547       da = r 
00548       db = z 
00549       return 
00550       end subroutine drotg
00551                                                                         
00552 !=============================================================================80
00553 
00554       subroutine  ccopy(n,cx,incx,cy,incy) 
00555 !                                                                       
00556 !     copies a vector, x, to a vector, y.                               
00557 !     jack dongarra, linpack, 3/11/78.                                  
00558 !                                                                       
00559       complex cx(*),cy(*) 
00560       integer i,incx,incy,ix,iy,n 
00561 !                                                                       
00562       if(n <= 0)return 
00563       if(incx == 1.and.incy == 1)go to 20 
00564 !                                                                       
00565 !        code for unequal increments or equal increments                
00566 !          not equal to 1                                               
00567 !                                                                       
00568       ix = 1 
00569       iy = 1 
00570       if(incx < 0)ix = (-n+1)*incx + 1 
00571       if(incy < 0)iy = (-n+1)*incy + 1 
00572       do 10 i = 1,n 
00573         cy(iy) = cx(ix) 
00574         ix = ix + incx 
00575         iy = iy + incy 
00576    10 continue 
00577       return 
00578 !                                                                       
00579 !        code for both increments equal to 1                            
00580 !                                                                       
00581    20 do 30 i = 1,n 
00582         cy(i) = cx(i) 
00583    30 continue 
00584       return 
00585       end subroutine  ccopy
00586 
00587 !=============================================================================80
00588 
00589       subroutine  cscal(n,ca,cx,incx) 
00590 !                                                                       
00591 !     scales a vector by a constant.                                    
00592 !     jack dongarra, linpack,  3/11/78.                                 
00593 !                                                                       
00594       complex ca,cx(*) 
00595       integer i,incx,n,nincx 
00596 !                                                                       
00597       if(n <= 0)return 
00598       if(incx == 1)go to 20 
00599 !                                                                       
00600 !        code for increment not equal to 1                              
00601 !                                                                       
00602       nincx = n*incx 
00603       do 10 i = 1,nincx,incx 
00604         cx(i) = ca*cx(i) 
00605    10 continue 
00606       return 
00607 !                                                                       
00608 !        code for increment equal to 1                                  
00609 !                                                                       
00610    20 do 30 i = 1,n 
00611         cx(i) = ca*cx(i) 
00612    30 continue 
00613       return 
00614       end subroutine  cscal

00616 !=============================================================================80
00617 
00618       subroutine  csrot (n,cx,incx,cy,incy,c,s) 
00619 !                                                                       
00620 !     applies a plane rotation, where the cos and sin (c and s) are real
00621 !     and the vectors cx and cy are complex.                            
00622 !     jack dongarra, linpack, 3/11/78.                                  
00623 !                                                                       
00624       complex cx(*),cy(*),ctemp 
00625       real c,s 
00626       integer i,incx,incy,ix,iy,n 
00627 !                                                                       
00628       if(n <= 0)return 
00629       if(incx == 1.and.incy == 1)go to 20 
00630 !                                                                       
00631 !       code for unequal increments or equal increments not equal       
00632 !         to 1                                                          
00633 !                                                                       
00634       ix = 1 
00635       iy = 1 
00636       if(incx < 0)ix = (-n+1)*incx + 1 
00637       if(incy < 0)iy = (-n+1)*incy + 1 
00638       do 10 i = 1,n 
00639         ctemp = c*cx(ix) + s*cy(iy) 
00640         cy(iy) = c*cy(iy) - s*cx(ix) 
00641         cx(ix) = ctemp 
00642         ix = ix + incx 
00643         iy = iy + incy 
00644    10 continue 
00645       return 
00646 !                                                                       
00647 !       code for both increments equal to 1                             
00648 !                                                                       
00649    20 do 30 i = 1,n 
00650         ctemp = c*cx(i) + s*cy(i) 
00651         cy(i) = c*cy(i) - s*cx(i) 
00652         cx(i) = ctemp 
00653    30 continue 
00654       return 
00655       end subroutine  csrot
00656 
00657 !=============================================================================80
00658 
00659       subroutine  cswap (n,cx,incx,cy,incy) 
00660 !                                                                       
00661 !     interchanges two vectors.                                         
00662 !     jack dongarra, linpack, 3/11/78.                                  
00663 !                                                                       
00664       complex cx(*),cy(*),ctemp 
00665       integer i,incx,incy,ix,iy,n 
00666 !                                                                       
00667       if(n <= 0)return 
00668       if(incx == 1.and.incy == 1)go to 20 
00669 !                                                                       
00670 !       code for unequal increments or equal increments not equal       
00671 !         to 1                                                          
00672 !                                                                       
00673       ix = 1 
00674       iy = 1 
00675       if(incx < 0)ix = (-n+1)*incx + 1 
00676       if(incy < 0)iy = (-n+1)*incy + 1 
00677       do 10 i = 1,n 
00678         ctemp = cx(ix) 
00679         cx(ix) = cy(iy) 
00680         cy(iy) = ctemp 
00681         ix = ix + incx 
00682         iy = iy + incy 
00683    10 continue 
00684       return 
00685 !                                                                       
00686 !       code for both increments equal to 1                             
00687    20 do 30 i = 1,n 
00688         ctemp = cx(i) 
00689         cx(i) = cy(i) 
00690         cy(i) = ctemp 
00691    30 continue 
00692       return 
00693       end subroutine  cswap
00694 
00695 !=============================================================================80
00696 
00697       subroutine  csscal(n,sa,cx,incx) 
00698 !                                                                       
00699 !     scales a complex vector by a real constant.                       
00700 !     jack dongarra, linpack, 3/11/78.                                  
00701 !                                                                       
00702       complex cx(*) 
00703       real sa 
00704       integer i,incx,n,nincx 
00705 !                                                                       
00706       if(n <= 0)return 
00707       if(incx == 1)go to 20 
00708 !                                                                       
00709 !        code for increment not equal to 1                              
00710 !                                                                       
00711       nincx = n*incx 
00712       do 10 i = 1,nincx,incx 
00713         cx(i) = cmplx(sa*real(cx(i)),sa*aimag(cx(i))) 
00714    10 continue 
00715       return 
00716 !                                                                       
00717 !        code for increment equal to 1                                  
00718 !                                                                       
00719    20 do 30 i = 1,n 
00720         cx(i) = cmplx(sa*real(cx(i)),sa*aimag(cx(i))) 
00721    30 continue 
00722       return 
00723       end subroutine  csscal
00724 
00725 !=============================================================================80
00726 
00727       integer function lctcsr(i,j,ja,ia)
00728       integer i, j, ja(*), ia(*), k
00729 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00730 !     locate the position of a matrix element in a CSR format
00731 !     returns -1 if the desired element is zero
00732 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00733       lctcsr = -1
00734       k = ia(i)
00735  10   if (k .lt. ia(i+1) .and. (lctcsr .eq. -1)) then
00736          if (ja(k) .eq. j) lctcsr = k
00737          k = k + 1
00738          goto 10
00739       end if
00740 !
00741       end function lctcsr
00742 
00743       end module blas_module
